h1. LinkedBlockingQueue Example
h2. Summary
This example shows how to send messages across VMs (threads) using a [LinkedBlockingQueue|http://java.sun.com/j2se/1.5.0/docs/api/java/util/concurrent/LinkedBlockingQueue.html].
This example will show pushing Date objects through the queue. The first node to start will listen for Date objects, and print them when received. Subsequent nodes will create a new Date and push it in to the queue.
h2. How to run
*Node 1:* {code} $ javac *.java $ start-tc-server & $ dso-java Main Waiting... (after starting other node...) Received Date: Sun Dec 09 15:16:26 PST 2007 {code}
*Node 2:* {code} $ dso-java Main {code}
